item.title: Quick Start for Hugo-Coder
item.description: Quick Start Link to heading To start using hugo-coder: Add the repository into your Hugo Project repository as a submodule, git submodule add https://github.com/luizdepra/hugo-coder.git themes/coder. Configure your config.toml. You can use this minimal configuration as a base. The config.toml inside the exampleSite from the exampleSite is also a good reference. Build your site with hugo serve and see the result at http://localhost:1313/. If you just want to test this theme, go to this page.
